title: Shocking Grasp

ch Knight

Sorcerer, Wizard, Arcane Trickster, Eldritch Knight

Shocking Grasp Tips & Notes in BG3

The spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8) and 10th level (3d8). A target with the Wet status is vulnerable to cold/lightning damage and will sustain double damage from this spell. Shocking Grasp is best used defensively to render an enemy unable to execute an Opportunity Attack when retreating. The verbal component has the caster saying "Fulgo", Latin for "flash".
